title: Java Chip Oreo Review - Oreo Oration
description:
Before Greg had his baby, he recorded 4 episodes of Oreo Oration. How deranged will the man become by the end of the 4th episode? Start the journey here as he rambles about a talking beetle and reviews these Java Chip Oreos. 

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny
